text: @realDonaldTrump @Franklin_Graham We'll also never replace the now hundreds of thousands of deaths thanks to YOUR abysmal mishandling of the covid-19 you fucking ASSHOLE!!! GET OFF IT!!! Just for show as per usual. You really don't care! You really shouldn't have bothered to show up! It's always you you YOU!!!
